biography.hint: A brief description of your character.

hp.label: Hit Points
hp.hint: The amount of damage your character can take before dying.

wil.label: Willpower
wil.hint: How strong your character's will is.

deprived.label: Deprived
deprived.tooltip: Somebody deprived of a crucial need (e.g. food, water, or warmth) cannot benefit from Rests

critical.label: Critical Damage
critical.tooltip: A character that takes Critical Damage is unable to take further action until they are tended to by an ally and have a Short Rest. If they are left for an hour without being tended to, they die.

Warns.canNotRest: You can't rest because you are deprived.
